com.shop.cache.api.client.main
Class SCDataBlock

java.lang.Object
  com.shop.cache.api.client.main.SCDataBlock

public class SCDataBlock
extends java.lang.Object

POJO/builder for holding cached object data: the object, it's key, etc.

canBeQueued

public SCDataBlock canBeQueued(boolean value)
change the value of the can-be-queued flag. If true (default), put operations may be queued to a background thread. If false, put operations will executed serially.

Parameters:
value - new value
Returns:
this
